channel.title: import on (kei㉿Spielplatz)-[~]$ sudo _
channel.description: Recent content in import on (kei㉿Spielplatz)-[~]$ sudo _

item.title: Importing Module
item.description: To use a Python module I can import it by typing import followed by the name of the module. This will import the module with all its functions and methods import string print(string.ascii_lowercase) I can just import a particular method or function in a module instead of the whole module from string import ascii_uppercase print(ascii_uppercase)
